positions.subtitle: MGVC
positions.description: •	Establishing sourcing and analysis of investment opportunities•	Conducting due diligence processes to validate investment theses and identify potential risk factors, including, strategies, product, team, technology, and IP, legal, tax and finance risks•	Leading negotiations with entrepreneurs, develop term sheets and final transaction documents for direct investments in association with the legal department •	Developing investment presentation to Investment Committee•	Ensuring effective closing processes •	Participating on Boards of Directors in observer positions•	Preparing reliable current and forecasting reports of portfolio companies•	Providing periodic reporting on fund performance to all stakeholders
positions.title: Investment Director
positions.description_html:
• Establishing sourcing and analysis of investment opportunities
• Conducting due diligence processes to validate investment theses and identify potential risk factors, including, strategies, product, team, technology, and IP, legal, tax and finance risks
• Leading negotiations with entrepreneurs, develop term sheets and final transaction documents for direct investments in association with the legal department
• Developing investment presentation to Investment Committee
• Ensuring effective closing processes
• Participating on Boards of Directors in observer positions
• Preparing reliable current and forecasting reports of portfolio companies
• Providing periodic reporting on fund performance to all stakeholders
